nodes.text: A magnetogravitic shield, also known as a magnetogravic shield, was a basic starship protection system that kept a ship from burning while traveling at near lightspeed. The system's function was to deflect minute particles away from the ship's hull. It could also operate inside the ship instead of outside in order to secure its cargo.

During the battle of Antolus I, the Separatists used the Maxillipede shuttle Conqueror, which was equipped with a magnetogravitic shield. This protection system kept the starship safe from the frequent meteor activity around Antolus I. While trying to escape the planet, High Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi altered the magnetogravitic shield of the shuttle in order to immobilize several iron-covered battle droids inside the ship.
